alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Decatur; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:34PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Monroe, southern Decatur, western Davis, Wapello, southeastern Marion, Wayne, southwestern Mahaska and Appanoose Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 233 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Pella to near Rathbun Lake to Leon. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rathbun Lake around 240 PM CDT. Centerville and Eddyville around 255 PM CDT. Lake Sundown around 300 PM CDT. Ottumwa and Ottumwa Industrial Airport around 315 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Rathbun, Bussey, Melrose, Mystic, Albia Municipal Airport, Honey Creek State Park, Cincinnati, Udell, Promise City and Exline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Davis; Decatur; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne
